name: Magnecord
description: Launch yourself higher and higher in this hardcore platformer. Use your Magne-launcher, a powerful tool that allows you to push yourself and pull yourself through the air. Traverse puzzles, explore scenic areas, learn about what it means to be a Magnesage. Master your Magne-launcher to surmount the toughest obstacles. Only the resilient... only the tenacious... only the insane will reach the top and be granted the rank of Magnesage.
